hrvatska-je-tada-prvi-puta-predstavljena: Croatia was then presented to the world scene of snow sports teachers for the first time, with great praise and ovations from all participants of the Interski Congress.
hrvatska-je-vec-u-startu-proglasena-za-n: Croatia was declared the best-dressed nation from the start, we were the only ones at the Interski Congress to have 3 different uniforms, but that was just a good announcement for what is to come.
hrvatski-demo-team-i-delegacija-su-prvi-: The Croatian demo team and delegation made their first appearance at the XVI Interski Congress held in 1999 in Beitostølen, Norway, and were declared the biggest surprise of the congress.
hrvatski-demo-team-odskijao-je-vrhunski-: The Croatian demo team skied superbly - fast, with excellent turns, without mistakes and with many compliments from other teams.
hrvatski-nastup-bio-je-u-cijelosti-na-na: The Croatian performance was entirely at the highest level, and all individual parts of the performance - lectures, workshops, and show performances were top-notch.
hrvatsku-s-kolu-skijanja-prezentirali-sm: We presented the Croatian ski school with top-notch show performances, seminars, lectures and the Alpine Skiing textbook, thus justifying the excellent reviews we received after our performance at the last congress in Argentina in 2015.
hzuts-je-clan-medunarodnih-organizacija-: HZUTS is a member of international snow sports organizations:
hzuts-se-sastoji-od-6-podrucnih-zborova-: HZUTS consists of 6 regional assemblies and they are:
hzuts-sudjeluje-u-razvoju-i-promicanju-s: HZUTS participates in the development and promotion of snow sports; training, education, retraining and instruction of staff and individuals involved in snow sports. HZUTS collaborates with the Croatian Olympic Committee, Croatian Ski Association, faculties, schools, institutes and other entities in the field of snow sports. An important goal of HZUTS is also to establish international connections and cooperation with international sports associations and organizations.
hzuts-zajedno-s-clanovima-svoje-nastavne: HZUTS, together with the members of its Teaching Commission, continuously works on improving teaching techniques, with the greatest emphasis placed on monitoring global trends and teaching methodologies.
iaess-licenca-se-produzuje-svake-3-godin: The IAESS license is renewed every 3 years by attending a HZUTS / Regional Assembly seminar lasting 3 days.
imati-zvanje-ucitelja-ili-trenera-sporto: To have the title of a teacher or snow sports coach (for a ski instructor, this means completing a program approved by the Ministry of Science and Education lasting at least 310 hours and passing an exam in front of the HZUTS commission)

intenzivirani-su-workshopovi-snowborda-i: The snowboarding and telemarking workshops have been intensified, as well as work with people with disabilities.
interski-kongres-koji-se-u-sijecnju-2011: The Interski Congress held in St. Anton in January 2011 was the largest and best organized Interski Congress to date. Representatives from 40 member countries of Interski International participated in the congress, with a total of more than 2,000 participants accredited. For Croatian skiing and HZUTS, this congress has been the most successful and highest quality performance so far.
interski-kongres-osnovali-su-predstavnic: The Interski Congress was founded by representatives of European Alpine countries to exchange information on the technique and methodology of teaching snow sports. The first Interski Congress was held in 1951 in Alberg, Austria, and the United States was the first non-European destination to host the Interski Congress in 1968 in Aspen.
interski-kongres-svjetska-je-organizacij: Interski Congress is a world organization.

na-interskiju-je-sudjelovalo-37-zemalja-: 37 countries participated in Interski. Each country has 3 show performances and 2 ski school display performances with teams of four to twelve members.
na-kongresu-je-prisustvovalo-1148-sudion: The congress was attended by 1148 participants from 34 world nations.
na-najstarijem-bugarskom-skijalis-tu-pam: The 21st Interski Congress was held at the oldest Bulgarian ski resort Pamporovo from March 16 to 23, 2019. In Bulgaria, 35 member countries of INTERSKI, ISIA organization, IVSI and IVSS participated, among which were a delegation from Croatia and the demo team of HZUTS.
na-nocnom-show-nastupu-najprije-se-maxim: At the night show performance, Maxime first descended straight on a monoski, followed by Davide performing an extraordinary jump, the ski resort spotlights went out and everyone was watching where the rest of the Croatian demo team was. The members of the demo team, one by one lit up LED lights on their suits and started in action. They rushed down the slope in top formation, in pitch darkness, illuminated only by LED lights. With this performance we surprised all participants and spectators and received top praise because skiing in pitch darkness formations when you can't see the ground under your feet is not that easy. We also impressed the audience with our choice of music (songs: Mama ŠČ, Top Gun Anthem) composed by Franjo Jardas.
na-sveopce-iznenadenje-svih-prisutnih-a-: To the general surprise of all present, especially the host and TV commentator, our demonstrator Nino Ružička descended through our formation on a BICYCLE!!! The measured speed was 93.3 km/h. This was the highlight of the congress opening. Excellent Dino and Ana, great team formation and finally Nino on a bicycle, led us to the title of the best team at the opening. In the following days we exchanged experiences with demonstrators from other participating countries, participated in workshops and various ski school presentations and prepared for other official appearances.

najnoviji-sustav-za-analizu-misicne-jako: The latest muscle strength analysis system Biodex System 4 PRO
najveci-broj-rehabilitacija-nakon-operac: The largest number of rehabilitations after anterior cruciate ligament surgery and other knee injuries
The largest number of rehabilitations after anterior cruciate ligament surgery and other knee injuries
nakon-izrade-iskaznicu-i-amblem-mozete-p: After creating the ID card and emblem, you can pick them up during office hours at HZUTS or we can send them to your home address.

nakon-uclanjenja-u-podrucni-zbor-i-hzuts: After joining the Regional Assembly and HZUTS, each member has the right to a membership card.
nasa-predavanja-su-bila-pracena-sa-velik: Our lectures were followed with great interest, and the discussions after the lectures showed that there is a great interest in Croatian skiing. Workshops were held on two topics - Croatian Ski School and New Way of Learning Snowboarding with the help of skiers, which was developed by Igor Kecerin with the help of Miki Toskic, a Croatian snowboard demonstrator. This approach to learning snowboarding has been very well received and rated. The Croatian Ski School was held in three languages: German, English and Italian.

novi-demo-team-izabran-tek-u-ozujku-2022: The new demo team, chosen only in March 2022, had just 29 days of ski training before the congress. Great effort, work and will led us to top success at the Interski Congress in Finland. Every nation performed at show performances and demonstrations of national ski schools.
novi-demo-team-predstavio-je-hrvatsku-na: The new DEMO TEAM represented Croatia at the 17th Interski Congress in Switzerland. The 35 countries participating in the congress were once again convinced that Croatia not only has Ivica and Janica Kostelic, but also a Croatian ski school with a hundred-year tradition.
od-ostalih-sudionika-uvelike-bi-pohvalil: From the other participants, Switzerland would be highly praised for their excellent performances and workshops. The Swiss demo team, thrilled with our performance, also suggested that we perform together at the next Interski congress on 1 show performance, which would be the first case of a joint performance in the history of Interski.
od-ostalih-zemalja-dojmile-su-nas-izvrsn: From the other countries, we were impressed by excellent Switzerland, Italy with an interesting display of what a snow kindergarten should look like, and attractive Argentina, the host with a large number of participants.
odlicnom-prezentacijom-demonstracijom-i-: With an excellent presentation, demonstration and explanation of the Croatian ski school, we thrilled everyone present. The result was 88 members from all delegations who attended our workshop, which is by far the highest number of workshop attendees throughout the entire congress.

uz-odlic-no-skijanje-koje-smo-pokazali-s: In addition to the excellent skiing we demonstrated, an even better lecture followed - "Croatian Ski School" and its field presentation with over 300 participants.
uz-odlicne-show-nastupe-demo-teama-imali: In addition to the excellent show performances of the Demo team, we had very noticeable and visited lectures and workshops, and we presented the Croatian ski school in the best way. voditelji-skijanja-muskog-spola-nakon-60: Male ski leaders after 60 years, and female ski leaders after 55 years of life and at least three confirmed IAESS licenses receive a permanent IAESS license without mandatory participation in the seminar.
voditelji-skijanja-nisu-isto-sto-i-ucite: Ski leaders are not the same as ski instructors. Leaders can work ONLY and EXCLUSIVELY with children, students or university students from the educational institution where they are employed. When leading such groups, they must also have a confirmation from the principal. They are not allowed to work through travel agencies with groups of people who have paid for arrangements through agencies. Ski instructors with a confirmed IVSI license are responsible for such work.

za-razliku-od-prakse-prethodnih-kongresa: Unlike the practice of previous congresses, the way of working at workshops in St. Anton has been changed. Participants spent from 10 to 13 hours working on one workshop and could not participate in another. This allowed for higher quality work at the workshop because participants practically couldn't switch workshops at will, which was possible at previous congresses. Due to such organization, there were more workshops, participants spent more time in the same group, which intensified mutual interaction and increased the number of questions.

zastita-i-privatnost-osobnih-podataka-gd: Protection and privacy of personal data (GDPR 2016/679) According to the new law related to the protection and privacy of data (GDPR 2016/679), all provided data is used exclusively for the purposes of organizing services (skiing) for which the user applies, and are not used for other purposes. We store and process received data using the safest methods of protection in accordance with these regulations, and we delete them respecting laws that are stated in a law related to protection and privacy of data. The user can request removal of their data from our system at any time by sending an email message to info@hzuts.hr

Protection and privacy of personal data (GDPR 2016/679) According to the new law related to the protection and privacy of data (GDPR 2016/679), all provided information is used exclusively for the purpose of registration in our member register and is not used for other purposes. We store and process received data using the safest methods of protection in accordance with these regulations, and we delete them respecting laws that are stated in the law related to data protection and privacy. The user can request removal of their data from our system at any time by sending an email message to info@hzuts.hr
